a.n: Owl City - Live from Los Angeles

p.d: "Live From Los Angeles" was filmed at Club Nokia on 21 July 2011. It includes tracks from "All Things Bright And Beautiful", alongside songs from "Ocean Eyes" and the self-released debut album "Maybe I'm Dreaming". Owl City is the creation of Adam Young, a Minnesota native who started making music at home and building up a fanbase via the internet before breaking worldwide with his global hit "Fireflies" in the summer of 2009. The single went to No.1 in both the US and the UK and many other countries. Adam Young has developed from a shy musician operating out of his bedroom into a confident and dynamic live performer and this concert in front of a wildly enthusiastic young audience proves just how good he and his band can be.
